title: Liam Hemsworth gets back to work while Miley Cyrus starts dating again
text:
Parkour is his new love (Picture: Backgrid)

Liam Hemsworth is back into the swing of things and throwing himself into work, shooting his new series Dodge and Miles amid Miley Cyrus dramatic split.

The 29-year-old was spotted bloodied and bruised on top of a taxi cab while filming scenes for his new show in Toronto.

He didn’t seem too bothered by the ongoing drama with his former wife Miley while running through the streets.

In fact, he must have spent his summer practising his parkour as his jump over the taxi seemed a little too easy for him.

The series follows Dodge Maynard (Liam) who, desperate to take care of his pregnant wife before a terminal illness can take his life, accepts an offer to participate in a deadly game where he soon discovers that he’s not the hunter, but the prey.

The Hunger Games actor had a tough summer following his split from the 26-year-old singer, his of just eight months.

Miley and Liam met while filming Nicholas Sparks romance The Last Song in June 2009 and began an on-again off-again relationship for the next few years.

They tied the knot in secret in December last year and it seemed to all go downhill from there.

The scene has him get yelled at by the taxi driver (Picture: Patriot Pics / BACKGRID)

Stretching for some more parkour (Picture: Patriot Pics / BACKGRID)

Meanwhile, Miley was reportedly spotted ‘kissing’ singer Cody Simpson, two weeks after splitting from Kaitlynn Carter.

The two stars were seemingly spotted by a fan as they dined at a restaurant on 3 October, with the fan quickly taking to social media to share footage of the two out on their date.

‘Miley on a date with the one and only Cody Simpson,’ they captioned the video.

An eyewitness later told E! News that they also saw the pair walking into a grocery store in Los Angeles, where they shared a ‘quick kiss’.

Miley was reportedly ‘dressed casually in a tank top’, and Cody ‘noticed people seeing them, so they tried to rush out of there,’ according to the source.

This isn’t the first time that they have been spotted together, with recent fan rumours indicating that the two have met a number of times recently.

Miley is going through all Australians like there’s no tomorrow (Picture: Kevin Mazur/WireImage)

Cody had admitted when he was 15 (he’s 22 now) that she was his celebrity crush.

‘I knew all the words to her song, I’m not gonna lie. I’m not ashamed about it, at all,’ he had said. ‘I was a big Miley Cyrus fan. I think she will be, forever, the most dateable Disney star.’

Dreams really do come true, huh?

Dodge and Miles will appear on the streaming service, Quibi.

Yet another streaming service is heading our way that people will be able to add to their growing collection.

Quibi is different from Netflix and Amazon Prime, however, in that all of its series will be produced as 10-minute episodes, and it will only be watchable on mobile devices.
